fitlab.resman¶

class fitlab.resman.RESMAN(mode='solo', ip=None, nworkers=None)[source]¶
gen_report(verb=0, level=0)[source]¶

Get a report.

Returns:
A list of the lines of the report.
get_residuals(par, calc=True, simple=False)[source]¶

Get the residuals that result from the given parameters.

Args:
par (vector): A vector (numpy array) of the parameters for the fit.
Returns:
A 3-tuple of the residuals, ‘r-residuals’, and normalized residuals. The r-residuals result from the correlational considerations.
